body.name: Tablet with Keyboard 2 in 1 Tablet Android Tablets 10 inch Include Case Mouse Stylus Tempered Film 6000mAh battery 4GB+64GB/512GB Expandable 10.1" Tableta, Dual Camera, WiFi Bluetooth Google Tablet PC
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 5 hrs 4 mins
features: 【Portable 2-in-1 Tablet PC】 Android 12 Tablet has passed GMS certification,tablet comes with bluetooth keyboard, wireless mouse and foldable protective case, it can flexibly turn tablet into a laptop mode or computer mode. By connecting the keyboard and wireless mouse through Bluetooth, it becomes an ultra portable mini laptop, perfect for home, school, and office use. Enables you to work and learn efficiently and quickly handle daily tasks, offers you limitless features and capabilities

【10.1 in HD Screen and HD lens】The stunning 10 IN eye protection full screen has a larger visual area and a wider visual field, adopts a 1280*800 IPS HD touch screen, whether you play games, watch movies, read, take notes and work, it can bring you immersive visual. The tablet 10" inch equipped with a 8MP rear camera with auto focus and flash, shooting is equally clear during the day and night, Capture Your Wonderful Moments. 2MP front camera bring excellent clarity during video calls enjoyment.

【Faster Responsive Performance】Our 10 inch tablet equipped with stable Android 12.0 system, Quad-core CPU, support G-sensor, Bluetooth, OTG, and FM. 4GB RAM(Contains 2GB of virtual memory) and 64GB ROM, with microSD card slot which can expanded up to 512GB, more app, songs, videos and pictures can be saved right on your tablet.

【Long Battery Life with Charger】 The Android 12 tablets powered by a 6000mAh battery, durable battery life ensures long-term use, allowing you to study, work, and play all day without interruption. Accompanying you from day to night can bring about 6 hours of regular operation, with a battery life standby of up to 12 hours, can easily charge via the 5V2A Type-C port.

Tablet Package include: 1* 10 inch tablet pc, 1* Bluetooth Keyboard, 1* mouse, 1* Standable Protective Case, 1* Screen protector, 1* flexible stylus, 1* Charger, 1*Type C Cable. Our tablet come with 1 year warranty and life time tech support. Any question, please feel free to contact us.
body.description: 2 in 1 Tablet Comes with Bluetooth Keyboard, Wireless Mouse and foldable protective case, it can flexibly turn tablet into a laptop mode, phone mode and computer mode for different usage- typing, browsing, gaming, video calling or watching movies, offers you limitless features and capabilities for your enjoyment. A perfect gift for students, writers, bloggers or businessman!

productInformation.value: 3.9 3.9 out of 5 stars 689 ratings 3.9 out of 5 stars

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #22,942 in Electronics (See Top 100 in Electronics) #491 in Computer Tablets

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The tablet downloads fast and has good quality. I have not used the keyboard yet but I am sure it is fine. The tablet pen is a little stubborn sometimes but I am satisfied with the product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Tablet or laptop?
reviews.reviewText: With the added mouse and keyboard, you can turn this tablet into a laptop and easily get all your work done, without having to carry around a laptop. My teenage uses her tablet to do all her schoolwork, and uses the mouse and keyboard regularly in order to do her assignments. Then she turns it back into a tablet to read, to watch shows, to play games. So far it's had no limits to what she can do with it. She can use it all day at school, come home, and not have to charge it until she goes to bed, and even then the charge is still good, she just likes it to be full for school. I bet the battery could go a couple days

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works great, weak battery?
reviews.reviewText: Tha table works great for the grandkids Roblox, YouTube. The battery drains kind of fast and slow to charge. They do ride it hard though. The battery issue probably not a problem if you use itgrandparent stile.I'm considering getting another one for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Such a waste, no battery life, cannot run one app.
reviews.reviewText: This hybrid tablet is a waste of time, money, fuel, effort and it's existence in general. We bought it for one purpose only, to use as a portable monitor for our home security system. Literally to run one single app. The battery life is non-existent and was dead within 2 hours. The image is extremely pixelated and you cannot make out anything the eight security cameras are showing on the single screen, however we can view the security camera images on our phones and the TV it is hooked up to Crystal Clear. I can't believe we bought a tablet for the sole purpose of running a single app and it could not even do that. It feels like a heavy duty expensive chromebook, don't waste your time or money. Especially for my people with disabilities and Mobility issues, don't even waste your time because you will have to find a ride to the UPS Store to return the darn thing the next day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Mouse don’t connect.
reviews.reviewText: The mouse don’t connect to the Bluetooth on the keyboard / tablet. I tried troubleshooting this device with no luck. They haptics to the keyboard are extremely slow. I can type a sentence and be done and it’s still typing on the tablet screen. It’s very low quality. However the tablet in itself is great for now. I will revisit if anything changes with an update.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great travel companion
reviews.reviewText: compact and comes with ALL you need. Great price and love the quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Nice look but slow
reviews.reviewText: Nice looking tablet but very slow in everything

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It was for my sister as she is going back to school to further her education and it is perfect for her to work on papers when she is on break at her current job.

reviews.reviewTitle: J'adore le clavier et le crayon et l'image est tres claire
reviews.reviewText: J'adore le clavier et le crayon et l'image est tres claire
After a first bad experience with a different tablet, I bought this one for my son and I am very satisfied. No problems so far, works perfectly. Nice to have detachable keyboard.

reviews.reviewTitle: Excellent what this can do for the super cheap price
reviews.reviewText: Way better than expected, can do everything the expensive brand models can do. Perfect fast delivery too.
取扱説明書もあり、すぐに必要なアプリが入っていたので設定が早く終わった。使いやすくてカバーが装着済みだったので良かった。
